QueryViewSpec.Name: Blackoutlabel Mailed Not Mailed Difference Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Displays the delta between mailed-not mailed blackout interactions.
QueryViewSpec.Author: Mark Sellers

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL:
with cteBlackoutInteractionsForScanDate (scanSession, interactionID, constituentId, sequenceID, interactionScanDate, interactionExpectedDate) as ( select ie.scansession, i.ID, i.CONSTITUENTID, i.SEQUENCEID, dbo.USR_UFN_GET_SCANDATE_FROM_SCANSESSION (ie.scansession) as InteractionScanDate, convert(date,i.EXPECTEDDATE) as InteractionExpectedDate from dbo.USR_INTERACTIONEXTENSION ie join dbo.INTERACTION i on i.ID = ie.ID where ie.PRINTBLACKOUTLABEL = 1 and dbo.USR_UFN_GET_SCANDATE_FROM_SCANSESSION (ie.scansession) in (select ScanDate from dbo.USR_BLACKOUT_INTERACTIONS_MAILED) )
select bi.interactionID, bi.sequenceID, bi.interactionScanDate, bi.scanSession, c.LOOKUPID, bi.interactionExpectedDate, bi.constituentId from cteBlackoutInteractionsForScanDate bi left join dbo.USR_BLACKOUT_INTERACTIONS_MAILED b on b.SequenceId = bi.SEQUENCEID and b.ScanDate = bi.InteractionScanDate and b.SponsorConstituentId = bi.CONSTITUENTID -- 17943 rows join dbo.CONSTITUENT c on c.ID = bi.CONSTITUENTID where b.SequenceId is null
